name: Bitshift (allisoninezlee)
description:
Relax and revisit some of your old pictures by solving slider puzzles of them.

You will be prompted by the game for a png file. The game will make a puzzle for you out of the given image (square images are preferred)

Followed this tutorial for the puzzle:

Sfx: https://freesound.org/people/cahen/sounds/191177/

If you want to see more games from us, we'll be here: https://twitter.com/secretcafegames
